member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: 20100604 allow explicit starting of the thread.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.TheMenustrip(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem[])
member.summary: Allow user to add an item to the MenuStrip

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.SwitchOffFile
member.summary: Allow application to switch off main menu items. Do after check on visibility as that wil probably make the visible.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.AddToolStripRange(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem[])
member.summary: 20091209 RPB added AddToolStripRange with list of ToolStripItems. This is to allow Toolstrip items after custom and generic ones.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.AddStatusStripItems
member.summary: Add generic toolstrip items.

members.member:
Check the form visibility using the security tables.
This gets called when switching to/from test database so the ToolTip texts are set the first time and are used to look up the translation. 'The ToolStripItem Available property is different from the Visible property in that Available indicates 'whether the ToolStripItem is shown, while Visible indicates whether the ToolStripItem and 'its parent are shown. 'Setting either Available or Visible to true or false sets the other property to true or false.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.CloseAllForms
member.summary: Used when switching to/from test database.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.Init
member.summary: Initialise all items.
member.remarks: Is called when program starts and when switching to/from test database.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.DeSelectedFont(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem)
member.summary: Make font of Button normal instead of bold to indicate that form is no longer open.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.ShowForm(System.Windows.Forms.Form,System.String,System.String,Utilities.MainDefinitions,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Override this sub to create the link between the menu name and the form to be shown.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.RefreshAll(System.String,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: A public call asks the form to refresh if it recognises the strings. Is called from the frmSemaphore. 20150815 added parameter lsemaphore

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.RefreshAll
member.summary: A public call which will refresh all open forms.

member.name: M:Utilities.MainForm.Do_Audio
member.summary: Check whether a form wants to have the audio file played. Set a flag so that the thread plays it.

member.name: M:Utilities.frmManage.CreateuserStatisticsBoxes(System.Int32)
member.summary: The Users tab shows the User statistics in textboxes instead of a DataGridView. This Sub builds the label/textboxes based on whether the associated DataGridView column is visible.

member.name: P:Utilities.frmStandard.Enable_ChkLevel_On_ChildControls
member.summary: '20120516 Set to allow fine tuning of controls in the form.

member.name: M:Utilities.frmStandard.RefreshTheForm
member.summary: Is called from MainFrom RefreshAll()

member.name: M:Utilities.frmStandard.ResetTheCell(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell)
member.summary: 20091130 RPB added ResetTheCell. Use these to reset the cell after the parent has finished loading.

member.name: M:Utilities.frmStandard.PrintDetailToExcel(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView)
member.summary: Print parent and 1 child

member.name: M:Utilities.frmStandard.CreateLabelAndTextBoxTooltips(System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection,System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.ComponentModel.IContainer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get visibility etc from the Utilities form_tble_column table for the field if the control is bound. Cast the control to find out what sort of control it is. Adjust visibility and then try to find the assoicated label adjusting it as well.
member.remarks: Controls is explicitly the groupbox Controls declaration. The Form Groupbox is different but casts to the groupbox control.

member.name: M:Utilities.frmStandard.CreateTooltips(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Couple tooltips to Groupbox and labels so that a user can see the name of the field. Translate groupbox name and label text. Set the width of text and combo boxes. Set the controls in a groupbox to read only if checked in m_form_grp_groupbox.
member.remarks: Add the dialog name and the dialog name, groupbox to the list of form_grp_groupbox.

member.name: P:Utilities.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Utilities.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Utilities.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgvEnter.DragAndDropUpdateAfter
member.summary: Default behaviour is to update the complete table to save Source and Destination.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgvEnter.DragAndDropColumnIsASource(System.Int32)
member.summary: Default behaviour is that all columns in the grid may be a Source. Override to get more control.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgvEnter.DragAndDropColumnIsADestination(System.Int32)
member.summary: Default behaviour is that all columns may be a Destination. Override to get more control over which columns may be a destination. Use blnMeIsSource which is true if the Source column is from the same grid as the Destination. If blnMeIsSource is true then use SourceColumn to identify the Source column.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgvEnter.DragAndDropIsMove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Default behaviour is to move from Source to Destination. Set blnMove = false to copy from Source to Destination for all Source columns. Get more control over which source columns are copied and which are moved by overriding this.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.GetFirstVisibleColumn
member.summary: Lookup the name of the first visible column in the datagrid.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.AdjustHorizontalAlignment
member.summary: 20100122 RPB created AdjustHorizontalAlignment()

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.PutColumnsInGrid
member.summary: 20100122 RPB modified PutColumnsInGrid by making call to AdjustHorizontalAlignment()

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.strGetEfficientSelect
member.summary: Construct a select statement from the visible fields. Can be used to construct a 'select * from xx where yy' based on filter settings. Is useful if there is alot of data and the filter settings are made before the FillTableAdapter() call; see Pricing Tool for an example.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.DefineColumn(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: 20120212 Simplified and preferred public version.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.AdjustFilterBoxesInGB(System.Int32)
member.returns: The width required for all the filters.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.SelectFirstTb
member.summary: Call to give the first visible filter textbox the focus. The user can immediately start typing.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.HideFilter
member.summary: 20100105 RPB added for via

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.blnStringHasWildCards(System.String)
member.summary: 20091124 RPB created blnStringHasWildCards. 20100122 RPB Modified blnStringHasWildCards: Do not check for *. Return true if the string contains a 'Like' wildcard.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.MakeFilter(System.Boolean)
member.summary: 20091124 RPB Modified MakeFilter: Do not use Like if string contains a wildcard character. 20091209 RPB Modified MakeFilter: Allow filter on DateTime by converting to string. 20100122 RPB Modified MakeFilter: Only add * if there is no * in the string already.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.strMakeFilter(System.Boolean)
member.summary: 20111004 Return the filter as a string. 20140807 Made function overriable. Used in GIS to set a flag if filters change.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.ColumnDoubleClick(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)
member.summary: 20091005 Added true to ColumnDoubleClick(strColumnName, strValue, True) to allow filtering on comboboxes from other forms.

member.name: M:Utilities.dgColumns.ColumnDoubleClick(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 20091005 Override so that Filtering from other form does allow ColumnDoubleClick

member.name: M:Utilities.statics.ModuleStatics.blnCheckGroupBoxLevel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: return the RO flag for the user, form, groupbox.
member.returns: true means read only. Returns false if the groupbox is not in the table. This happens the first time the groupbox is shown in a form. Do this because the default in the table is read only = false.

member.name: M:Utilities.statics.ModuleStatics.blnCheckLevel(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Return true if the user may use the form.
member.remarks: do add forms to m_form if they come this way.

member.summary: Print to a network printer using the IP address. Check this when we have printer names and a DNS.
